page.title: 12INCHINNAN HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: When India Tyres closed about 4 years ago,the people who live in the small estate next to the factory lost more than just their jobs-their way of life changed.The bus company,for example, changed their timetable and now there is only one bus an hour and the last bus is at 5.30pm! The estate,built 50 years ago,is situated just off a busy main road and is about two miles from Inchinnan and three miles from Renfrew.It is very isolated with no amenities-no Post Office or shops and the nearest doctor is three miles away. The 108 residents-most of whom own their own homes-started a Tenants' Association,to try and get amenities in the area eg.a playground for the children.So far they have not been successful.
